p: After 24-h incubation, the cytotoxicity of the treatment was measured using the 3-[4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl]-2,5-diphenyl tetrazolium bromide (MTT) assay according to previously published methods [ 32]. The assay was carried out three times and, in each experiment, each concentration was tested almost in triplicate. Cell viability was determined as follows: ((OD treated cells − OD medium control)/(OD untreated cells − OD medium control)) × 100.
